Title: Gosford Park
Writer: Julian Fellowes, Robert Altman (based upon an idea by), Bob Balaban (based upon an idea by)
Actors: Maggie Smith, Michael Gambon, Kristin Scott Thomas, Camilla Rutherford
Plot: Set in the 1930s, this movie brings a group of pretentious rich and famous together for a weekend of relaxation at a hunting resort. But when a murder occurs, each one of these interesting characters becomes a suspect.
Production: Film Council, Sandcastle 5 Productions, Capitol Films, USA Films, Medusa Film
